fullplot: Teenager Andie is one of the not-so-popular girls in high school. She usually hangs out with her friends Iona or Duckie. Duckie has always had a crush on her, but now she has met a new guy at school, Blane. He's one of the rich and popular guys but can the two worlds meet?
plot: A poor girl must choose between the affections of her doting childhood sweetheart and a rich but sensitive playboy.
title: Pretty in Pink
